nav.div: West Essex Regional School District » Parents & Community » COVID-19 Information

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.15px; font-size: 22px; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The following page has been set up to house information about 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) as well as West Essex Regional School District's response to this emerging situation. Since the circumstances around the spread of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) are ever-changing, we will continue to update this page with new resources.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.15px; font-size: 22px; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Any information or significant developments surrounding this issue will continue to be communicated through email and texts.
